cont.entity_a: Music sounds phenomenal with great bass and treble. The sound is amazing, with a full range and great bass.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is good, but bass is lacking. Sound quality is good with sharp, clear sound and good bass.

cont.entity_a: Durability issues with wires and earbud covers falling off. Earbud covers are easily lost, affecting usability.
cont.entity_b: Wire connection at the plug becomes exposed quickly. Wires become misshaped over time. Durability issues with wires fraying and sound cutting out.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable for small ears with super-soft gel tips. Earbuds fit well with three sizes of tips available.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable fit with three sets of ear pieces. Earbuds fit snugly, eliminating ambient noise.

cont.entity_a: Fit is comfortable but doesn't block out all sound. Earbuds fit well but ear tips can loosen and fall off.
cont.entity_b: Fit is snug and blocks ambient noise well.
Noise-cancelling attributes and sound quality are good. Noise reduction is excellent. Good noise cancellation without requiring batteries.

cont.entity_a: Great customer service experience with free upgrade.
Counterfeit products are a concern when purchasing online.
Great sound quality but not suitable for workouts due to sweat.

cont.entity_b: Microphonic cord transmits noise from movement. Durable with no cable shorts or breaks after 1.5 years.
